SEARCH
Module com.gluonhq.richtextarea
Package com.gluonhq.richtextarea.model

Class DecorationModel

java.lang.Object
com.gluonhq.richtextarea.model.DecorationModel
public class DecorationModel extends Object
A DecorationModel contains the text and paragraph decorations for a fragment of text, defined by a start position and a length.

    • getStart

      public int getStart()
      Returns the start position of the fragment that has this decoration model
      Returns:
      the start position of the fragment

    • getLength

      public int getLength()
      Returns the length of the fragment that has this decoration model
      Returns:
      the length of the fragment

    • getDecoration

      public Decoration getDecoration()
      Returns the decoration for the fragment. It can be a TextDecoration like font or color, or an ImageDecoration, which inserts an image at the start of the fragment
      Returns:
      the decoration for the fragment

    • getParagraphDecoration

      public ParagraphDecoration getParagraphDecoration()
      Returns the ParagraphDecoration for the fragment, that is used to style the paragraph that contains such fragment.
      Returns:
      the paragraph decoration for the fragment
